bioconda.name: bioconductor-crimage
bioconda.summary: CRImage a package to classify cells and calculate tumour cellularity

biotools.summary: This tool provides functionality to process and analyze images, in particular to classify cells in biological images. Furthermore, in the context of tumor images, it provides functionality to calculate tumour cellularity.

bioschemas.name: CRImage
bioschemas.summary: This tool provides functionality to process and analyze images, in particular to classify cells in biological images. Furthermore, in the context of tumor images, it provides functionality to calculate tumour cellularity.
